summary: Four teens summon forth a diminuitive, demonic minion from The Other Side to do their bidding and grant their wishes, but of course, they must all ultimately pay the price...
cast: Louis Tripp|Simon Reynolds|James Villemaire|Pamela Adlon|Neil Munro|James Kidnie|Irene Pauzer|Larry O'Brey|Elva Mai Hoover|Gerry Mendicino|Mark Saunders|Todd Postlethwaite|Edward Leefe|Layne Coleman|Anita Olanick|Carl Kraines|Andrea Ladányi
title: La puerta 2
